column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////There are so many good ones
column2: but one kind of secret one I like to get is the ham and chicken croquettes. They're crisp and cheesy gooey and come with TWO sauces. CBBR also has some classics. The patatas bravas are great
column3: the tortilla espanola is an eggy delight
column4: and you have to get some bacon-wrapped dates. They also have these chorizo-wrapped dates that are stuffed with I think manchego
column5: and you can order them by the piece. See
